Text: Thanks snakEye and happy new year
is it worth it if you had GEX or not

Happy New Year Snakeye!  No, do not use this if you have GEX!  This was actually the first thing I had installed when starting my FSX project.  It was okay but far too much greenage and the textures are a bit FS9 ish.  However, it does cover the whole world opposed to GEX where you have to get individual areas.  Thanks for everyhing Snakeye!

Correct, it's either this or GEX you should be using.
GEX IMO is much better.
this could be a good solution mainly for FS9
thanks for the reply...i'll stick with GEX
